topics.body: So does anyone have any nerdy podcasts they could recommend? I follow the Best Friendscast and a smaller podcast called Weekly Manga Recap but I've been trying to get into more.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
Gunbuster: The robot is just like Getter robo G, And the basic plot is aim for the ace meets top gun with a dash of The forever war.

Evangelion: Ultraman meets Super robot manga with Nihilism

FLCL: I couldn't possibly tell you.

Diebuster: Their most original work.

Gurren lagann: The Getter robo Saga, Meets Gaiking, In the setting of Xabungle for the first half, And Gunbuster for the second.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184
